    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    ActiveActor
    The ActiveActor class represents an actor that is actively moving or interacting in the game.
    ActiveActorDestructible
    The ActiveActorDestructible class extends the ActiveActor class and implements the Destructible interface.
    Boss
    Represents the Boss entity in the game, inheriting from FighterPlane.
    BossProjectile
    Represents a Boss's projectile fired towards the player.
    Controller
    The Controller class handles the interaction between the user interface and the game's logic.
    Destructible
    Represents an object that can be damaged and destroyed.
    EnemyPlaneV1
    Represents an enemy plane in the game, specifically the version 1 of the enemy plane.
    EnemyPlaneV2
    Represents the second version of an enemy plane that spins and fires projectiles.
    EnemyProjectile
    The EnemyProjectile class represents a projectile fired by an enemy.
    EnemyProjectileV2
    The EnemyProjectileV2 class represents a more advanced projectile fired by an enemy, which tracks the user's plane and adjusts its trajectory accordingly.
    FighterPlane
    Abstract class representing a Fighter Plane, capable of firing projectiles, taking damage, and triggering visual effects when damaged or destroyed.
    GameOverImage
    Represents the "Game Over" image displayed at the end of the game.
    GunDisplay
    Class responsible for displaying the current gun in use on the screen.
    HeartDisplay
    Class to manage and display the hearts (lives) on the screen.
    Level_Interface
    The Level_Interface class is responsible for managing and displaying the user interface (UI) elements associated with a level, including the heart display, win image, game over image, and kill count.
    LevelBoss
    The LevelBoss class represents the Boss level in the game.
    LevelBoss_Interface
    The LevelBoss_Interface class manages the UI elements specific to the boss level, including the shield image for the boss.
    LevelOne
    The LevelOne class represents the first level in the game.
    LevelTwo
    The LevelTwo class represents the second level in the game.
    Main
    The Main class is the entry point for the Sky Survivor game.
    MainMenu
    Main menu scene for the game, displaying the title and buttons to start or exit the game.
    Projectile
    The Projectile class represents a destructible projectile that can be fired by various actors in the game.
    Scene_Properties
    Abstract class that defines the properties and behaviors for a game scene.
    Shield
     
    UserPlane
    Represents a user-controlled fighter plane in the game.
    UserPlane.GunType
     
    UserProjectile
    The UserProjectile class represents a projectile fired by the user in the game.
    WinImage
    The WinImage class represents an image that is displayed when the player wins the game.
